CREATE TABLE AS SELECT CASE END FROM "INNER JOIN" "OUTER JOIN" "LEFT JOIN" "RIGHT JOIN" "LEFT OUTER JOIN" "RIGHT OUTER JOIN" ON WHERE "GROUP BY" "ORDER BY" "UNION ALL" UNION create table as select case end from "inner join" "outer join" "left join" "right join" "left outer join" "right outer join" on where "group by" "order by" "union all" union
